snippet: A majority of Americans oppose supplying military aid to Syrian rebels, but they are not paying much attention to the situation there, new national polls find.
abstract: A majority of Americans oppose supplying military aid to Syrian rebels, but they are not paying much attention to the situation there, new national polls find.

headline.main: Americans Are Reluctant to Aid Syrian Rebels, Polls Show
